title: Hay Bales
name: 01.jpg
caption: I love hay bales. Took this snap on a drive through the countryside past some straw fields.

title: Anybody Can Code
caption: In less than 10 months of using Treehouse, Bryan landed his first full time professional programming job and got a huge increase in salary! Join Treehouse today, start your free trial and become our next success story!

title: Lake
name: 02.jpg
caption: The lake was so calm today.

title: Canyon
name: 03.jpg
caption: Hiked to the top of the mountain and got this picture of the canyon and trees below.

title: Iceberg
name: 04.jpg
caption: It was amazing to see an iceberg up close, it was so cold but didn’t snow today.

title: Desert
name: 05.jpg
caption: The red cliffs were beautiful. It was really hot in the desert but we did a lot of walking through the canyons.

title: Fall
name: 06.jpg
caption: Fall is coming, I love when the leaves on the trees start to change color.

title: Risk and Reward: Joe’s Story
caption: Joe had always thought you needed to fit a certain stereotype to be a developer. When he realized there was the opportunity for him to learn to code and make a difference as a developer, he took the risk and switched careers. Since learning with Treehouse, Joe has embraced a rewarding career as a developer.

title: Plantation
name: 07.jpg
caption: I drove past this plantation yesterday, everything is so green!

title: Dunes
name: 08.jpg
caption: My summer vacation to the Oregon Coast. I love the sandy dunes!

title: Becoming a Developer without a College Degree: Scott's Story
caption: Scott chose to learn to code online with Treehouse after dropping out of college to avoid the debt of student loans. He finished the Front End Development Track in 6 weeks, and a week later landed a position as a front end developer. Students like Scott all over the world use Treehouse to learn to code and set themselves on a path to success.

title: Countryside Lane
name: 09.jpg
caption: We enjoyed a quiet stroll down this countryside lane.

title: Imagine What You Can Do in a Year
caption: Ashley had plateaued in her job and was looking for a new career path doing something creative, that would also give her the flexibility to spend time with her family. In a year – without a college degree or any previous coding experience – Ashley learned to code and built an impressive portfolio of projects.

title: Sunset
name: 10.jpg
caption: We enjoyed a quiet stroll down this countryside lane.

title: Cave
name: 11.jpg
caption: I did a tour of a cave today and the view of the landscape below was breathtaking.

title: Bluebells
name: 12.jpg
caption: I walked through this meadow of bluebells and got a good view of the snow on the mountain before the fog came in.
